trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around June 1st 2010
Summary: Noticed what looked like a very bright star in the western sky, however it became really bright , then dim didnt move at all.
divs: Sighting Detailswas on my back patio looking out when i saw what looked like a very bright star,i know the sky and it wasnt venus or the north star,it was very bright did not move ,warbled a little became very dim almost completelt out ,then it would flare up again.Over the span of an hour or so it slowly moved out of view ina north west direction,the only thing it could have been is a helicopter but i grew up near two major airports in nyc and this was not a helicopter light ,it eminated like a mini sun
